description: React component for user settings, allowing users to view and modify preferences such as theme and notifications. It fetches existing settings on load, allows local modifications, and saves updates via API calls.

methods.name: Settings()
methods.description: React functional component that manages user settings UI, fetches initial data, handles user input, and submits updates.

methods.name: handleChange
methods.description: Handles form input changes, updating the component state accordingly.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Handles form submission, sending updated settings to the API and updating the status message.
